mapper.update: update product set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip_price = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, original_price = #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, type_id, `name`, description, vip_price, price, original_price, inventory, picture from product where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, type_id, `name`, description, vip_price, price, original_price, inventory, picture from product
